report.title: Filterable records by year
report.description: Counts records by year with standard params support.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(#from_year#, date_part('year', now())::integer) as years(no) left join (cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# #idlist# ) on date_part('year', o.date_start)=years.no
